entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:40 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 6:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 1.0°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
